extendedInfo.description: Comprehensive local news, weather and sports coverage for Kansas City, Missouri and Kansas. Breaking news and severe weather coverage with live streaming video.Exclusive content:* Breaking News Alerts directly from the NBC 41 Action News Newsroom * Severe Weather Alerts directly from the NBC 41 Action Weather Team* Kansas City's Most Accurate Forecast* 7-Day Forecast* Updated animated images from ESP Live Radar* Call for Action Consumer Alerts* Sports * Kansas City Chiefs football* Kansas City Royals baseball* College sports* Missouri Tigers* Kansas Jayhawks* Kansas State Wildcats* Local Entertainment* Watercooler and weird stories * Celebrity news Exclusive app features:* Updated text stories, video and photos from KSHB NBC 41 Action News and nbcactionnews.com.* The latest Top Stories from other local Kansas City area news sources. * Live streaming video for breaking news, severe weather and major events.* Share important stories with your friends via Facebook, Twitter and e-mail, directly from the app. * Report breaking news to NBC Action News, directly from the app.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Works better than the fox 4 app and the channel 9 app. Love it. Hasn\'t force closed or froze or nothing. very happy with it.
reviews.author: Patsy Godfrey

reviews.title: ok
reviews.comment: OK at best, just enough to say they have an app for that. Doesn\'t seem to get updates on the weekends or holidays. Links in articles are not active, which is so easy to do it\'s silly that these don\'t link. The first website ever created had hyperlinks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: Awesome app
reviews.author: Rafe O\'Connell

reviews.title: The weather radar needs to update
reviews.comment: The weather radar needs to start updating because you can\'t see what the current weather is it go with two days behind
reviews.author: Courtney cramer

reviews.comment: Great for accurate local weather!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just ok
reviews.comment: The weather blog doesn\'t load up correctly.  This is the only reason I want the app.
reviews.author: Tommy Reardon

reviews.comment: Awsome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Goggle user
reviews.comment: Exccelent work
reviews.author: jony roshid

reviews.title: Amazing!!
reviews.comment: Great app great station!
reviews.author: Mike Wang

reviews.title: Best, fastest KC local news app
reviews.comment: The perfect local news companion. The news is constantly updated, the video content plays beautifully and the weather is spot-on. Great application.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC sensation
reviews.comment: I have had this app since I got this phone...close to a year ago. Worked great most of the time until this past week.  Now it force closes before the app even opens completely or tells me an unexpected problem has occurred and won\'t open at all. Please fix!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless app
reviews.comment: Useless app. Links do not work, they only loop around to the main page. Channel 5 has the same exact problem. Using a Samsung galaxy s3 with android ICS 4.0.4
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Annoying ad
reviews.comment: Removed because of the annoying pop-up ford ad.
reviews.author: Ken Denning

reviews.title: :D
reviews.comment: Very nice and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update much faster
reviews.comment: New update is great. Much faster & more options to choose from for weather, news, sports, traffic, etc. Awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: MaryAnn
reviews.comment: I use this app all the time! I luv the weather as well as news stories. It\'s so fast & easy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: weather
reviews.comment: the guys that are doing the weather awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Paul
reviews.comment: Just switched from another news app(9) This is so much user friendly.Great Job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Forces close, can\'t open it at all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus S 4G Not Compatible?
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app for the better part of a year...factory reset my phone, go to re-download, and it now tells me that my phone isn\'t compatible but my wife\'s cheap ZTE Score from Cricket IS? What the heck is wrong with this picture. Is it an ICS issue? I\'m confused. Someone let me know what the deal is, seriously.
reviews.author: A Google User
